code:
```
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic x3,
    input logic x2,
    input logic x1,
    output logic f
);

always @(*) begin
    f = (x2 & ~x1) | (x2 & x1) | (x3 & x1);
end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

module TopModule (
